alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lee County through 545 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cape Coral, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, McGregor, Matlacha, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Pineland, Cypress Lake, St. James City, Pine Island Center, Iona, Burnt Store Marina, Saint James City, Bokeelia, Useppa Island, Whiskey Creek, Punta Rassa and North Fort Myers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
